title: doc: document idempotent Closer from os/exec in go1.2.html
body:
Should the changes from revision ef345053cf89 be mentioned in the Go 1.2 release notes?

I think at least the "the return value isn't an *os.File anymore" part should
be mentioned since it might fall into the "wrong but often done" category. You
did embed an *os.File on purpose, after all.
